SKT_FIRST.name: Lunge
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>UPさせる。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并使自身<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>。

SKT_SECOND.name: Quick Assault
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Speed</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、自分の<color=#28d9ed>スピード</color>が<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPする。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并使自身<color=#28d9ed>速度</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Noble Strike
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nIf this attack kills an enemy, increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> and increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>3 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。\nこの攻撃で敵を倒した時、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>が<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>UPし、自分の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>が<color=#28d9ed>3ターン</color>の間UPする。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다.\n이 공격으로 적을 처치하면 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>가 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 증가하고 <color=#28d9ed>3턴</color> 동안 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>이 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人。\n若该攻击致使敌人死亡,则使自身<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升\n<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>,并使自身<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>3回合</color>。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to increase Speed for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率でスピードが<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPする。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>が<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPする。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 속도가 증가합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>가 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携技能自由顺序效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率使速度提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,使自身<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
